data.name: Dazzler
data.description: International pop diva and super hero, Dazzler's mutant power to convert sound into energy creates light shows that can captivate audiences or protect her fellow X-Men in battle.

starItems.name: Dazzler
starItems.description: International pop diva and super hero, Dazzler's mutant power to convert sound into energy creates light shows that can captivate audiences or protect her fellow X-Men in battle.

1.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>80%</color> damage + apply <color=#fff568>Offense Down</color>.

This attack cannot be counterattacked.

2.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>110%</color> damage + apply <color=#fff568>Offense Down</color>.

This attack cannot be counterattacked.

3.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>140%</color> damage + apply <color=#fff568>Offense Down</color>.

This attack cannot be counterattacked.
3.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>30%</color> damage to primary target
In <color=#fff568>CRUCIBLE</color>, on Crit, <color=#86e619>50%</color> chance to apply <color=#fff568>Blind</color> to the primary target

4.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>170%</color> damage + apply <color=#fff568>Offense Down</color>.
In <color=#fff568>CRUCIBLE</color>, on Crit, <color=#86e619>50%</color> chance to apply <color=#fff568>Blind</color> to the primary target.

This attack cannot be counterattacked.

5.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>200%</color> damage + apply <color=#fff568>Offense Down</color>.
In <color=#fff568>CRUCIBLE</color>, on Crit, <color=#86e619>50%</color> chance to apply <color=#fff568>Blind</color> to the primary target.

This attack cannot be counterattacked.
5.nextUpgrade:
In <color=#fff568>CRUCIBLE</color>, flip <color=#fff568>Defense Up</color> on primary target
+<color=#86e619>50%</color> damage to primary target

6.description:
In <color=#fff568>CRUCIBLE</color>, flip <color=#fff568>Defense Up</color> on the primary target.

Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>250%</color> damage + apply <color=#fff568>Offense Down</color>.
In <color=#fff568>CRUCIBLE</color>, on Crit, <color=#86e619>50%</color> chance to apply <color=#fff568>Blind</color> to the primary target.

This attack cannot be counterattacked.
6.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>50%</color> damage to primary target
In <color=#fff568>CRUCIBLE</color>, on Crit, always apply <color=#fff568>Blind</color>

7.description:
In <color=#fff568>CRUCIBLE</color>, flip <color=#fff568>Defense Up</color> on the primary target.

Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>300%</color> damage + apply <color=#fff568>Offense Down</color>.
In <color=#fff568>CRUCIBLE</color>, on Crit, apply <color=#fff568>Blind</color> to the primary target.

This attack cannot be counterattacked.

1.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>80%</color> damage.

Barrier self and <color=#fff568>UNLIMITED X-MEN</color> allies for <color=#86e619>10%</color> of this character's Max Health.

This attack is Unavoidable and cannot be counterattacked.

2.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>120%</color> damage.

Barrier self and <color=#fff568>UNLIMITED X-MEN</color> allies for <color=#86e619>10%</color> of this character's Max Health.

This attack is Unavoidable and cannot be counterattacked.
2.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>40%</color> damage to primary target
Apply <color=#fff568>Blind</color> to primary target

3.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>160%</color> damage + apply <color=#fff568>Blind</color>.

Barrier self and <color=#fff568>UNLIMITED X-MEN</color> allies for <color=#86e619>10%</color> of this character's Max Health.

This attack is Unavoidable and cannot be counterattacked.
3.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>40%</color> damage to primary target
Reduce Speed Bar by <color=#86e619>25%</color> on the primary target

4.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>200%</color> damage, apply <color=#fff568>Blind</color>, and reduce Speed Bar by <color=#86e619>25%</color>.

Barrier self and <color=#fff568>UNLIMITED X-MEN</color> allies for <color=#86e619>10%</color> of this character's Max Health.

This attack is Unavoidable and cannot be counterattacked.
4.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>50%</color> damage to primary target
In <color=#fff568>CRUCIBLE</color>, apply <color=#fff568>Regeneration</color> to self and all <color=#fff568>UNLIMITED X-MEN</color> allies

5.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>250%</color> damage, apply <color=#fff568>Blind</color>, and reduce Speed Bar by <color=#86e619>25%</color>.

Barrier self and <color=#fff568>UNLIMITED X-MEN</color> allies for <color=#86e619>10%</color> of this character's Max Health.
In <color=#fff568>CRUCIBLE</color>, apply <color=#fff568>Regeneration</color> to self and all <color=#fff568>UNLIMITED X-MEN</color> allies.

This attack is Unavoidable and cannot be counterattacked.
5.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>50%</color> damage to primary target
+<color=#86e619>20%</color> of this character's Max Health as Barrier

6.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>300%</color> damage, apply <color=#fff568>Blind</color>, and reduce Speed Bar by <color=#86e619>25%</color>.

Barrier self and <color=#fff568>UNLIMITED X-MEN</color> allies for <color=#86e619>30%</color> of this character's Max Health.
In <color=#fff568>CRUCIBLE</color>, apply <color=#fff568>Regeneration</color> to self and all <color=#fff568>UNLIMITED X-MEN</color> allies.

This attack is Unavoidable and cannot be counterattacked.

7.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>360%</color> damage, apply <color=#fff568>Blind</color>, and reduce Speed Bar by <color=#86e619>25%</color>.

Barrier self and <color=#fff568>UNLIMITED X-MEN</color> allies for <color=#86e619>30%</color> of this character's Max Health.
In <color=#fff568>CRUCIBLE</color>, apply <color=#86e619>2</color> <color=#fff568>Regeneration</color> to self and all <color=#fff568>UNLIMITED X-MEN</color> allies.

This attack is Unavoidable and cannot be counterattacked.

1.description:
Attack all enemies for <color=#86e619>100%</color> damage.

This attack cannot be counterattacked.
1.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>50%</color> damage to all enemies
Flip <color=#86e619>1</color> negative effect to a positive effect on self and all <color=#fff568>UNLIMITED X-MEN</color> allies

2.description:
Flip <color=#86e619>1</color> negative effect to a positive effect on self and all <color=#fff568>UNLIMITED X-MEN</color> allies.

Attack all enemies for <color=#86e619>150%</color> damage.

This attack cannot be counterattacked.
2.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>50%</color> damage to primary target
In <color=#fff568>CRUCIBLE</color>, flip all negative effects to positive effects instead

3.description:
Flip <color=#86e619>1</color> negative effect to a positive effect on self and all <color=#fff568>UNLIMITED X-MEN</color> allies.
In <color=#fff568>CRUCIBLE</color>, flip all negative effects to positive effects on self and all <color=#fff568>UNLIMITED X-MEN</color> allies instead.

Attack all enemies for <color=#86e619>200%</color> damage.

This attack cannot be counterattacked.
3.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>50%</color> damage to all enemies
Apply <color=#fff568>Ability Block</color> to the primary target
This attack gains +<color=#86e619>1,000%</color> Extra Focus

4.description:
Flip <color=#86e619>1</color> negative effect to a positive effect on self and all <color=#fff568>UNLIMITED X-MEN</color> allies.
In <color=#fff568>CRUCIBLE</color>, flip all negative effects to positive effects on self and all <color=#fff568>UNLIMITED X-MEN</color> allies instead.

Apply <color=#fff568>Ability Block</color> to the primary target.

Attack all enemies for <color=#86e619>250%</color> damage.

This attack gains +<color=#86e619>1,000%</color> Extra Focus and cannot be counterattacked.
4.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>50%</color> damage to all enemies
Apply <color=#fff568>Slow</color> to all enemies

5.description:
Flip <color=#86e619>1</color> negative effect to a positive effect on self and all <color=#fff568>UNLIMITED X-MEN</color> allies.
In <color=#fff568>CRUCIBLE</color>, flip all negative effects to positive effects on self and all <color=#fff568>UNLIMITED X-MEN</color> allies instead.

Apply <color=#fff568>Ability Block</color> to the primary target.

Attack all enemies for <color=#86e619>300%</color> damage + apply <color=#fff568>Slow</color>.

This attack gains +<color=#86e619>1,000%</color> Extra Focus and cannot be counterattacked.
5.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>50%</color> damage to all enemies
Flip <color=#86e619>2</color> negative effects to a positive effects on self and all <color=#fff568>UNLIMITED X-MEN</color> allies

6.description:
Flip <color=#86e619>2</color> negative effects to positive effects on self and all <color=#fff568>UNLIMITED X-MEN</color> allies.
In <color=#fff568>CRUCIBLE</color>, flip all negative effects to positive effects on self and all <color=#fff568>UNLIMITED X-MEN</color> allies instead.

Apply <color=#fff568>Ability Block</color> to the primary target.

Attack all enemies for <color=#86e619>350%</color> damage + apply <color=#fff568>Slow</color>.

This attack gains +<color=#86e619>1,000%</color> Extra Focus and cannot be counterattacked.

7.description:
Flip <color=#86e619>2</color> negative effects to positive effects on self and all <color=#fff568>UNLIMITED X-MEN</color> allies.
In <color=#fff568>CRUCIBLE</color>, flip all negative effects to positive effects on self and all <color=#fff568>UNLIMITED X-MEN</color> allies instead.

Apply <color=#fff568>Ability Block</color> to the primary target.

Attack all enemies for <color=#86e619>450%</color> damage + apply <color=#fff568>Slow</color>.

This attack gains +<color=#86e619>1,000%</color> Extra Focus and cannot be counterattacked.

1.description:
On <color=#fff568>Blind</color>, gain <color=#fff568>Deflect</color>.

Gain +<color=#86e619>10%</color> Focus.
<color=#fff568>UNLIMITED X-MEN</color> allies gain +<color=#86e619>10%</color> Focus.
1.nextUpgrade:
In <color=#fff568>CRUCIBLE</color>, on Spawn, Barrier self and all <color=#fff568>UNLIMITED X-MEN</color> allies for <color=#86e619>15%</color> of this character's Max Health
Gain +<color=#86e619>10%</color> Focus

2.description:
In <color=#fff568>CRUCIBLE</color>, on Spawn, Barrier self and all <color=#fff568>UNLIMITED X-MEN</color> allies for <color=#86e619>15%</color> of this character's Max Health.

On <color=#fff568>Blind</color>, gain <color=#fff568>Deflect</color>.

Gain +<color=#86e619>20%</color> Focus.
<color=#fff568>UNLIMITED X-MEN</color> allies gain +<color=#86e619>10%</color> Focus.
2.nextUpgrade:
On <color=#fff568>Blind</color>, clear all <color=#fff568>Blind</color> from self and all <color=#fff568>X-MEN</color> allies
<color=#fff568>UNLIMITED X-MEN</color> allies gain +<color=#86e619>10%</color> Focus

3.description:
In <color=#fff568>CRUCIBLE</color>, on Spawn, Barrier self and all <color=#fff568>UNLIMITED X-MEN</color> allies for <color=#86e619>15%</color> of this character's Max Health.

On <color=#fff568>Blind</color>, gain <color=#fff568>Deflect</color> and clear all <color=#fff568>Blind</color> from self and all <color=#fff568>X-MEN</color> allies.

Gain +<color=#86e619>20%</color> Focus.
<color=#fff568>UNLIMITED X-MEN</color> allies gain +<color=#86e619>20%</color> Focus.
3.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>15%</color> of this character's Max Health as Barrier
When an <color=#fff568>UNLIMITED X-MEN</color> ally gains a negative effect, fill this character's Speed Bar by +<color=#86e619>5%</color>

4.description:
In <color=#fff568>CRUCIBLE</color>, on Spawn, Barrier self and all <color=#fff568>UNLIMITED X-MEN</color> allies for <color=#86e619>30%</color> of this character's Max Health.

When an <color=#fff568>UNLIMITED X-MEN</color> ally gains a negative effect, fill this character's Speed Bar by <color=#86e619>5%</color>.

On <color=#fff568>Blind</color>, gain <color=#fff568>Deflect</color> and clear all <color=#fff568>Blind</color> from self and all <color=#fff568>X-MEN</color> allies.

Gain +<color=#86e619>20%</color> Focus.
<color=#fff568>UNLIMITED X-MEN</color> allies gain +<color=#86e619>20%</color> Focus.
4.nextUpgrade:
Fill this character's Speed Bar by +<color=#86e619>5%</color>
Gain +<color=#86e619>15%</color> Focus
<color=#fff568>UNLIMITED X-MEN</color> allies gain +<color=#86e619>15%</color> Focus

5.description:
In <color=#fff568>CRUCIBLE</color>, on Spawn, Barrier self and all <color=#fff568>UNLIMITED X-MEN</color> allies for <color=#86e619>30%</color> of this character's Max Health.

When an <color=#fff568>UNLIMITED X-MEN</color> ally gains a negative effect, fill this character's Speed Bar by <color=#86e619>10%</color>.

On <color=#fff568>Blind</color>, gain <color=#fff568>Deflect</color> and clear all <color=#fff568>Blind</color> from self and all <color=#fff568>X-MEN</color> allies.

Gain +<color=#86e619>35%</color> Focus.
<color=#fff568>UNLIMITED X-MEN</color> allies gain +<color=#86e619>35%</color> Focus.
